Name: TC_LOGOUT_001
Precondition:
User has an active account
Logged in
Dashboard page opened
Objective: Verify that the user can successfully log out from the application
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system displays the profile menu with account settings and the Logout 
option

The system logs the user out, invalidates the active session and redirects 
the user to the Login page

Name: TC_LOGOUT_002
Precondition:
User has an active account
Logged in
User has logget out the session
Login page is displayed
Objective: Verify user cannot access dashboard after logout using browser back button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click the back button on browser
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system does not allow access to the dashboard, keeps the user on the 
Login page,and does not restore the revious session

The system does not restore the session and continues to display the Login 
page

Name: TC_LOGOUT_003
Precondition:
User has an active account
User is logged in
User has opened the dashboard in two browser tabs
Objective:
Verify that logging out from one browser tab terminates the session in all 
open tabs.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Log out from the application in the first browser tab
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system logs the user out and redirects to the login page in the first 
tab

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Switch to the second browser tab
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system does not allow access to the dashboard and redirects the user to 
the login page

The system does not restore the session and continues to display the login 
page
